short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to play YouTube videos fullscreen within your browser's window.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When watching a video on YouTube, using this extension will play the video full screen within the browser's window.
